       ∅দুই মাস ব্যাপী∅
দিন -প্রতি শনিবার বিকেল ৫টায়

Enlist your name within 30th june
Seats are limited
*For any other details call---9609211610/8116090195

message: Hei kgpians wake up..The very frist time in kharagpur we r going to creat an acting institute.Where u all can learn the deep base of acting(Characterization,Grooming,Personality devlopment,Mym,Pantomym,Theatrical acting,Stage performance,Performance in Front of camera and lots more) and we r makeing a profesonal theatre repertory team wit our studnts.Very nominal fees tht evreyone can afford ..Free singing classes also.special cares for child artists .for all boys & girls.minimum age 5yrs.for further details call-9002815390,9609211610

Hello Student Entrepreneurs!

This summer, kickstart your startup adventure and take it to the next level with ‘iB Hubs Startup School’, a specially designed 4-week acceleration program with focused learning, expert mentorship, and rapid experimentation.

Best Part: No program fee. Hurry up!!! 

Register now at http://ibhubs.co/startupschool/ and don't forget to tag the Startup Jantha!

Dear Students,

Mr. Anish Reddy, distinguished alumnus of IIT Kharagpur and Co-Founder of Capillary Technologies is visiting the campus today. Capillary Technologies is a software product company, which provides cloud-based Omnichannel Customer Engagement, eCommerce platform and related services for retailers and brands. 

Mr.Anish Reddy is also the founder​ of Technology​ Robotix​ Society and Entrepreneurship Cell IIT Kharagpur.

An interactive session has been planned with them in SN Bose  from 8pm.

Two posts of General Secretary (Students’ Welfare) i.e. 01 male and 01 female is to be created from Autumn Semester 2017-18.
 
Application are invited for the said posts latest by 26th April 2017, to be submitted at T.S.G., Criteria for the posts remain same as for the other G.Sec. posts of TSG.

Submit your applications mentioning your basic details in the main Gymkhana Office to Mr. Prithwiraj Mahto before the deadline.

The Annual Gymkhana Awards Ceremony will be conducted at the Netaji Auditorium from 6.30pm onwards today. All medal winners, award winners and cup winners will be felicitated at the ceremony, and the annual reports will be read out by the outgoing office bearers, as the new office bearers are welcomed into the fold.

Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur invites the entire student community of IIT Kharagpur to be a part of the proceedings and make this event a success!!

APPLICATIONS ARE INVITED FOR THE POST OF SECRETARY, INNOVATION CUP (UNDER TECHNOLOGY), TECHNOLOGY STUDENTS' GYMKHANA.

(Deadline: 21st April, 2017)
Eligibility Criteria: Minimum 1 year of stay at IIT Kharagpur

Interested students can fill the application form attached below.
